item.title: Production Status Tags
item.description: It is recommended that customers use a tag to indicate if nodes are currently in production or not. For example, you may wish to have a tag such as prod_status with possible values like deploying for devices still being deployed production for devices actively in user decommission for devices that are being removed Itâ€™s important to have these tag names and values be consistent within the organization including case. Production and production would be viewed as two different values, as an example.
